name: lambda
description: This is a sample template for lambda - Below is a brief explanation of what we have generated for you:

scripts.deploy: sam deploy --template-file packaged.yaml --stack-name dackbot-yougif-command --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM --region us-west-2 --parameter-overrides DackbotWebhookId=${env:DACKBOT_WEBHOOK_ID} DackbotWebhookToken=${env:DACKBOT_WEBHOOK_TOKEN} GfycatClientId=${env:GFYCAT_CLIENT_ID} GfycatClientSecret=${env:GFYCAT_CLIENT_SECRET}
